oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Portrait inside Central High School auditorium
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Group portrait of several unidentified men and women seated on stage inside the Central High School auditorium in Columbia. Among them are people performing blackface minstrelsy. Band members sit with their instruments below the stage.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Group portraits; Auditoriums; Stages (platforms); Blackface entertainers
